entry.title: Vollrath VP16 - Chamber Vacuum Packaging Machine with ACS and USB - Two 16" Seal Bars
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vollrath
Type: Vacuum Packaging Machine
Price: 9740.00

Vollrath's VP16 vacuum packaging machine is designed for easy use and cleaning, high performance, and durability. This large unit has a smooth, stainless steel exterior and a transparent, soft-open lid.

This model is very similar to the Vollrath 40833, but with some added features: password-controlled access, HACCP logging, and label printing provide added safety and convenience. A helpful liquid-control feature ensures high-quality packaging, and optional programs like soft-air, tenderize, marinate and more allow you to use this vacuum sealer for a variety of foods.

entry.title: Atmovac Diablo12 - Chamber Vacuum Packaging Machine - 12" Seal Bar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Atmovac
Type: Vacuum Packaging Machine
Price: 1243.00

Whether you're looking to reduce food waste, divy-up portions for future use, sous-vide cook, or marinade, the Atmovac Diablo12 is a vacuum sealer that's perfect for the job. Its the ideal choice for all foodservice operators wanting a budget-friendly alternative.

The Diablo12 is built to commercial grade. It's control interface is user-friendly, and the machine itself is easy-to-clean. In terms of functions, this vacuum packager has one time based program, a marinating function, external and internal sealing, and gas injection. The sealing bar on this unit is 12", and the sealing cycle sits at around 30 to 40 seconds.

entry.summary:
Vendor: VacMaster
Type: Vacuum Packaging Machine
Price: 1699.00

Whether you run a small restaurant or delicatessen, or if you regularly hunt or fish and are shopping for domestic use, the VacMaster VP215 chamber sealer could work for you. You can use this vacuum packaging machine to store your food, or the sealed products can be used with a sous vide cooker.

Its body is completely constructed of stainless steel. Its seal bar is 10" with double seal capabilities. With an easy-to-use digital control panel and pressure gauge, the VacMaster VP215 gives you a straightforward approach to sealing. entry.title: Atmovac Oroshi16D - Chamber Vacuum Packaging Machine - Two 16" Seal Bars
entry.summary:
Vendor: Atmovac
Type: Vacuum Packaging Machine
Price: 6784.00 - 7282.00 (2 variants)

The Atmovac Oroshi16D chamber vacuum sealer is the perfect addition to any commercial food service operation looking to reduce on both food waste and food spoilage. 

As a chamber vacuum sealer, the Atmovac Oroshi16D enables you to completely submerse your goods in the chamber, and then proceeds to equalize the pressure on both the inside and the outside of the packaging. As a result, you'll find this machine ideal for sealing larger portions. It can even seal liquids with ease.

The Atmovac Oroshi16D is one of the most feature heavy options in the Atmovac line. With app compatibility, the Oroshi16D comes with the abilities to define program names and labels, control settings, (de)activate options and functions, HACCP log, and wireless print.  

In terms of specifications, the Oroshi16D comes with a two 16.5" sealing bars, and is completely made of stainless steel. Its standard operating features include sensor control settings, touch controls, double seal capabilities, soft air, and liquid control. The machine's overall sealing cycle is 20 - 40 seconds. 

Last but not least, the Oroshi16D is made in the Netherlands!

      • Two 16" sealing bars
      • Stainless steel construction
      • 20 - 40 second cycle
      • 21 m³h pump speed
      • Chamber dimensions of 18.1" x 16.5" x 7"
      • Made in the Netherlands

SPECS

Model Oroshi16D
Dimensions (WDH) 25" x 20" x 18.3"
Chamber Dimensions 18.1" x 16.5" x 7"
Sealing Beam 16.5"
Pump Speed 21 m³h
Plug Nema 5-15
﻿Volts 120
Weight 156 lb

WARRANTY

One year parts and labour.

DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.summary:
Vendor: Atmovac
Type: Vacuum Packaging Machine
Price: 4901.00

The Atmovac Arctic16D chamber vacuum sealer is the perfect addition to any commercial food service operation looking to reduce on both food waste and food spoilage. 

As a chamber vacuum sealer, the Atmovac Arctic16D enables you to completely submerse your goods in the chamber, and then proceeds to equalize the pressure on both the inside and the outside of the packaging. As a result, you'll find this machine ideal for sealing larger portions. It can even seal liquids with ease.

Some brands make clear distinctions between their external and internal sealing appliances. However, the Atmovac Arctic16D comes with an external sealer to help you take care of those smaller portions. Please keep in mind that the external sealer would not be as efficient as the internal for sealing large portions of liquid.

In terms of specifications, the Arctic16D comes with two 16" sealing bars, and is completely made of stainless steel. It's standard operating features include sensor control and a cut-off seal. The machine's overall sealing cycle is 20 - 40 seconds.

entry.title: Hamilton Beach Commercial PrimaVac 406 - Chamber Vacuum Packaging Machine - 16" Seal Bar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamilton Beach
Type: Vacuum Packaging Machine
Price: 3598.00

Hamilton Beach Commercial's "PrimaVac 406" is an ideal vacuum sealer for a high volumes and delicate ingredients. It has an extra-long 16" seal bar for wide bags or two 8" bags at once

This sealer can also hold larger containers and jars for additional processing options. The gas flush feature is specifically designed for packaging delicate ingredients. By replacing oxygen with inert gas, it helps to preserve the colour and texture of certain foods and minimizes the potential of crushing fragile contents by creating a pillow effect.

      • Adjustable vacuum cycle time, sealing time, and cooling time
      • Removable heat seal bar is protected with a silicone pad for easy cleaning and food safety
      • Removable filler plate lifts out to provide room for bulky food

entry.title: Waring Commercial WVS50 - Pistol Vacuum Packaging Machine
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Vacuum Packaging Machine
Price: 335.00

The Waring WVS50 is a pistol style vacuum packaging machine, which is easy-to use and great for sous-vide cooking. This hand-held vacuum sealer comes with 25 one-quart bags and 25 one-gallon bags, that are all microwave safe, boil safe, and perfect for sous-vide cooking. Plus additional bags can always be ordered at a low cost. 

Some of the benefits of vacuum sealing include that you'll be reducing food waste, eliminating freezer burn, increasing your profitability by extending the shelf life of your ingredients, and that you'll be hygienically protecting your food from the effects of microorganisms. 

      • Pistol style, easy operating handheld vacuum sealer
      • Heavy-duty enclosed storage/charging base
      • Rechargeable NiMH battery
      • Seal up to 50 bags with one full charge
      • Trigger operation allows for vacuuming delicate and softer products

entry.title: Waring Commercial WCV300 - Chamber Vacuum Packaging Machine - 11" Seal Bar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Vacuum Packaging Machine
Price: 1428.00

The Waring WCV300 allows you to package liquids and liquid-rich foods like fresh meats, soups, marinades, and stews cooking . The process is simple: just place a filled pouch into the chamber, and press a button to vacuum seal!

The 11" seal bar double-seals the pouch, guaranteeing complete, long-lasting closure. And when you’re done, refrigerate or freeze for later use. Vacuum-sealed pouches are boil, freezer, and microwave safe -- they are perfect for sous vide cooking. This machine comes with 50 one-quart bags and 50 two-quart bags.

entry.title: Berkel 350 - Chamber Vacuum Packaging Machine - 19" Seal Bar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Berkel
Type: Vacuum Packaging Machine
Price: 8881.00

The Berkel 350 is a reliable tabletop vacuum package machine designed to meet most mid- to high-volume foodservice establishments — for all of their portion control, product storage and food retail needs. The units offer a spacious stainless steel chamber, powerful, high quality pump and a single 19" seal bar providing a high integrity double seal with
electric cut-off.

The 350 offers an anaerobic gas flush to maintain product colour in the vacuum package, extend shelf life and/or to provide a pillow-pack seal to protect the product. And to make matters all the better, it is simple to operate and maintain.

      • Chamber size of 20" x 18" x 6.8” 
      • Stainless steel housing and vacuum chamber
      • Seal bar provides high integrity sealing double sealing
      • Vacuum levels are modifiable for the application
      • Up to 30 storable programs
      • High-quality 21 m³/h Busch vacuum pumps

WARRANTY

1 year warranty coverage of all parts, service, and travel excluding wear items
